channel.title: Movies on My Little Stories
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on My Little Stories

item.title: My Favorite Movies
item.description: My Favorite Hollywood Movies I am a big fan of Quentin Tarantino and I love all of his movies. But the following movies are top notch in my opinion and I never get bored of watching them. Pulp Fiction Django Unchained Kill Bill: Volume 1 Kill Bill: Volume 2 Inglourious Basterds The Hateful Eight Next, I am huge fan of Clint Eastwood and I love his movies too.
